abstract: Opinionated navigation architecture and transition guide for SwiftUI iOS 26 / Swift 6.2 apps, aligned with modular MVVM-C. Contains 54 rules across 8 categories enforcing @Equatable views, @Observable state, App-target coordinator + route-shell navigation, coordinator-owned modal state, zoom transitions, and zero legacy APIs. Each rule includes incorrect vs. correct examples with quantified impact metrics.
